bike.description: A6-SL Quaternary phase Aluminum, custom butted, integrated Tapered head tube with 1 1/2" lower bearing, hydroformed top and down tube, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: A6-SL Quaternary phase custom butted Aluminum, w/Low Leverage Rockers, FSR 125mm travel, Cold forged dropout with CNC D disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots

components.description: ROCKSHOX Recon Silver TK  Solo Air Taper steerer, 120mm travel w/ PopLoc Remote LockOut
Shimano XT SGS Direct Mount Top normal 9sp
Fuji Custom Centerlock 32H MTB Disc Hubs with Alex DP17 rims, Double Wall with CNC Sidewalls
Shimano Bl-M505 Hydraulic Disc Brake Lever
Oval M-200 15mm 5sweep Double Butted 6061 Riser Bar 31.8mm
